yarraView: Explore Yarra River Water Quality

yarraView-package.Rd

Provides an interactive dashboard and tools for visualizing water quality data from the Yarra River, including temperature, turbidity, salinity, and pH measurements from the 1990s to 2020s.

Main Functions

  • yarra_view: Launch interactive dashboard

Data

  • yarra_water: Water quality monitoring dataset

See also

Useful links:

  • https://etc5523-2025.github.io/assignment-4-packages-and-shiny-apps-linhngo66/

Author

Maintainer: Linh Ngo tngo0043@student.monash.edu

Examples

if (interactive()) {
# Launch the dashboard
library(yarraView)
yarra_view()

# Or access data directly
data(yarra_water)
}
